name: Clyde (Neverny Studios)
description:
We return to the office of the first saga of the game combined with that of fnaf 2

with a rabbit named clyde mass 3 nights

before starting the game a text will tell you something

and you will have to put this

they are numbers

1, 2, or 3,

at night 2 a winged rabbit appears next to your office close the door if you look to the right side the cameras will appear
